title: Aqours’s Repayment
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Ah! Mia-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What’s going on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ruby-chan asked me to create a special training plan for you, Mia-chan. You helped Ruby-chan with a game, right? Everyone in Aqours knows about it, you know~ That’s why I’m here today to repay you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Whaat!? Um, it’s okay, you don’t have to. I already train with Ai and Karin anyway......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Are you sure about that~? Isn’t the mantra of Nijigaku “friends yet rivals”? ......Don’t you wanna give Ai-chan and Karin-chan a great surprise?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Well, um......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>So you wanna do it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>......I’ll do it, I guess......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Alright, alright! Then I’ll develop a special training plan for you. But first, I need to know your current fitness level, so let’s evaluate you with this training plan. I just rewrote it the other day, so I’m confident it’ll help~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hold on, hold on! Isn’t this even more intense than the last one!? This is way too high level for me! Come on, Kanan! Seriously! I can’t do this~~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
